Industries: Legal Services, Business Services, Management Consulting, Transportation/Trucking/Railroad
Company description: Il Gruppo Spinelli è dal 1963 sinonimo di logistica, grazie alla sua presenza diffusa e capillare su tutto il territorio nazionale. Le business units del Gruppo permettono di offrire servizi integrati che rispondono alle esigenze di tutta la filiera logistica: terminal portuale, trasporto intermodale, camionistico, warehousing, aree di deposito, riparazione, compravendita container ed operazioni doganali.  L’attività storica del Gruppo è quella del trasporto su gomma che si svolge nelle basi operative di Genova, Padova, Livorno, Milano (Arluno), La Spezia (Santo Stefano Magra) e Reggio Emilia (Dinazzano) e si avvale di oltre 600 mezzi di proprietà.  I centri intermodali di Reggio Emilia, Padova e Milano movimentano ogni anno circa treni che trasportano le merci verso i più importanti porti italiani: Genova, Livorno e La Spezia, dove sono localizzate altre strutture intermodali di proprietà.  La divisione GPT del Gruppo Spinelli opera nel Porto di Genova offrendo servizi di imbarco/sbarco di containers, ro-ro e merce varia e movimentando annualmente volumi superiori ai 500.000 TEUs. Le recenti acquisizioni di quote di Terminal Rinfuse Genova Srl e di Salerno Container Terminal-SCT S.p.a, hanno ulteriormente sviluppato la divisione terminal. La divisione Depositi offre attività di riparazione, deposito, movimentazione e compravendita containers. Tale attività è svolta in strutture presenti presso i terminal interni di Milano (Arluno), Reggio Emilia (Dinazzano), Vignole Borbera, La Spezia, Livorno e nel porto di Genova e di Genova Pra’-Voltri.  Centro Servizi Derna srl e Consorzio Genova Distripark di Prà-Voltri si occupano dell’attività di warehousing, trasporti convenzionali ed eccezionali, depositi nazionali doganali e merci varie, imballaggi industriali. Saimare S.p.A. opera nel settore delle spedizioni con una presenza diretta nei principali porti italiani, tra cui Genova, Savona Vado, La Spezia, Napoli, Livorno, Cagliari e Gioia Tauro.

Company description: Koleje Śląskie Sp. z o.o. to regionalny przewoźnik kolejowy, który koncentruje się na zapewnieniu dostępnego i komfortowego transportu kolejowego dla wszystkich pasażerów, w tym osób z niepełnosprawnościami. Misją firmy jest eliminowanie barier w dostępie do usług transportowych oraz tworzenie przyjaznego środowiska dla podróżnych, co jest integralną częścią jej strategii. Koleje Śląskie dążą do ciągłego doskonalenia swoich usług, w tym poprzez rozwój cyfrowych narzędzi, takich jak strona internetowa i aplikacja mobilna, które są zgodne z najwyższymi standardami dostępności. Klientami firmy są zarówno mieszkańcy regionu, jak i turyści, a partnerami lokalne instytucje kultury, z którymi współpracują w ramach programów promocyjnych. Dzięki innowacyjnym rozwiązaniom i zaangażowaniu w dostępność, Koleje Śląskie stają się liderem w regionie w zakresie transportu kolejowego.

Company description: Rhein-Main-Verkehrsverbund GmbH (RMV) is a pivotal entity in the public transportation landscape of the Frankfurt Rhein-Main region, responsible for the planning, coordination, and financing of local transport services. The company is dedicated to promoting sustainable and efficient mobility solutions that cater to the needs of the community while contributing to the reduction of CO₂ emissions. RMV serves as a crucial link between various transport providers, political decision-makers, and passengers, striving to create an integrated and user-friendly transportation system. With a focus on enhancing public transport accessibility, RMV facilitates the movement of over 700 million passengers annually through a network that includes buses, trains, and innovative on-demand services. The company's mission emphasizes the importance of environmentally friendly transportation options and the improvement of infrastructure and service quality to meet the increasing demands of the region's population. RMV collaborates with local transport companies, municipalities, and stakeholders to eliminate barriers to public transport access, encouraging more residents to utilize its services. Among its innovative initiatives are the development of a cloud-based journey planning system, the introduction of the JobTicket to promote sustainable commuting, and the RMVplus app, which allows users to book various mobility services seamlessly. Targeting a diverse clientele that includes commuters, students, seniors, and tourists, RMV offers tailored mobility packages to businesses, enhancing employee satisfaction while contributing to environmental sustainability. The company is also at the forefront of pioneering projects, such as autonomous shuttles and alternative propulsion systems, leading the way in the mobility transition and climate protection efforts. With a vision for a sustainable and interconnected transport network, RMV is committed to facilitating a smooth transition towards multimodal mobility solutions that benefit the entire region.

Name: Trigion Traffic Support
Technologies: drie, LinkedIn Insights
Company description: Trigion Traffic Support is een toonaangevend bedrijf dat professionele verkeersbegeleiding biedt voor bouw- en infraprojecten. Met een team van gediplomeerde beroepsverkeersregelaars staat de organisatie garant voor de veiligheid van wegwerkers, de bereikbaarheid van bouwplaatsen en een optimale verkeersdoorstroming. De missie van Trigion Traffic Support is om een veilige werkomgeving te creëren en verkeershinder te minimaliseren, terwijl de visie gericht is op het onderhouden van goede contacten met diverse stakeholders voor een positieve bijdrage aan projecten. Hun klanten omvatten wegenbouwbedrijven en overheidsinstanties, en ze bieden een compleet dienstenpakket, waaronder instructie, projectmanagement en 24/7 ondersteuning. Trigion Traffic Support streeft ernaar om met hun expertise en ervaring een efficiënte en veilige verkeersbegeleiding te realiseren, zodat alle betrokken partijen zich kunnen concentreren op hun eigen taken.

Company description: Zugvogel Speditions GmbH is a forward-thinking logistics company dedicated to sustainable transport practices that minimize environmental impact by reducing CO2 emissions and energy consumption. With a strong commitment to sustainability, the company employs energy-efficient vehicles and optimized route planning, ensuring that ecological responsibility is at the forefront of its operations. A key initiative is its subsidiary, Zugvogel Renewable Logistics GmbH, which specializes in comprehensive logistics solutions focused on renewable energy, essential for a greener future. The company collaborates with sustainable partners and utilizes advanced technologies, such as AI, to enhance efficiency and reduce fuel consumption. Zugvogel Speditions GmbH serves a diverse clientele, emphasizing intermodal transport solutions that combine road, rail, and sea transport to further decrease carbon footprints. Through ongoing employee training and internal environmental initiatives, the company fosters a culture of sustainability within its workforce.

Company description: Entur AS is a Norwegian company that specializes in providing ticket sales for public transportation, including train journeys within Norway and across Europe. The company acts as an intermediary, allowing customers to purchase tickets through various channels such as the Entur app, the Entur website, and ticket machines at train stations. Entur's mission is to facilitate seamless travel experiences by offering comprehensive ticketing solutions while ensuring that customers are informed about the terms and conditions associated with their purchases. The company collaborates with multiple transport operators, including Vygruppen AS, SJ Norge AS, and GoAhead Norge AS, to serve a diverse clientele that includes both domestic and international travelers. By prioritizing customer service and real-time travel information, Entur aims to enhance the overall efficiency and convenience of public transport in Norway and beyond.

Name: Intermodaltrasporti
Locations: [Italy, California, Monastir, 09023], [Italy, Veneto, Carmignano Di Brenta, Via Dell'industria E Dell'artigianato, 35010], [Italy, Sardinia, Assemini, Strada Macchiareddu, 09032], [Italy, Latium, Ferentino], [Italy, Novara, Agognate, 12 Case Sparse, 28100], [Italy, Latium, 7 Via Cangiano, 03012], [Italy, Livorno, Collesalvetti, 11 Via Sacco E Vanzetti, 57017]

Company description: Our company was founded in 1987 by Pietro Fiorini and today is the leader of a group of companies operating in integrated logistics and multimodal transport. Among the most competitive companies in Europe, we work integrating road, rail and sea transport, using upstream and downstream warehouses and terminals for storage and transit time of goods. The choice of intermodal management allows us to offer logistics solutions that are efficient in terms of time, cost and eco-sustainability. The continuous process of growth and innovation, the international vocation, the use of highly qualified resources, the exclusive service level and the substantial specific investments in the sector make us a competitive, solid and reliable reality. Our mission is to create highly innovative and reliable solutions, customer-oriented in compliance with high-quality standards for all services offered. Through high-level partnerships with Europe's leading rail and maritime operators and thanks to our thirty years of experience in the field, we are able to offer quality, environmentally friendly freight traffic management that meets all customer needs. A solid logistics network and a large fleet of bulk and tank containers allow us to plan for the same shipment the ideal combination of different modes. The standardised loading units adapt to the technical and specific needs of the different types of transport, guaranteeing an efficient traffic system with a considerable reduction in the impact on the environment. Our company carries out its activities in an environmentally friendly way, minimizing CO2 emissions and making rail and sea transport the main vectors of use. Today we transport about 80% of our goods by rail and ship.

Company description: SMET, led by CEO Cav. Domenico De Rosa, is a prominent player in the logistics and transportation sector, specializing in road, rail, and maritime services. The company is committed to enhancing road safety and promoting responsible driving behaviors, as evidenced by its support for the recent reforms to the Codice della Strada aimed at increasing penalties for dangerous driving and improving regulations for new drivers and electric scooters. SMET's mission revolves around fostering a culture of safety and responsibility among road users, particularly the youth, through education and proactive measures rather than solely punitive actions. The company collaborates with public and private sectors to improve infrastructure and implement advanced technologies, ensuring a comprehensive approach to road safety. SMET serves a diverse clientele, including individuals, businesses, and governmental organizations, all of whom benefit from its expertise in logistics and commitment to sustainable practices.

We open up for possibilities and experiences. We open up for meetings, and a sense of belonging and community. We aim to make it easy to travel by any of our 14,000 daily bus and train departures. All our bus and train services are outsourced and run by private bus and train companies.

Name: Skandia Container Terminal
Company description: CONTAINER  Scandinavia's largest container port lies in Gothenburg and is also the only port in the Nordic region with deep-sea direct calls to all parts of the world. Most of the goods are on their way to or from other parts of the world, either directly by transoceanic ship or by feeder ship via the continent. Skandia CT AB in the Port of Gothenburg has specific resources and competencies to meet these requirements. WE CREATE COMPETITIVE TRANSPORT SOLUTIONS  Quay productivity for ocean going ships of at least 100 units/hour.  Excellent geographical location to reach all parts of Scandinavia and the Baltics.  27 daily rail shuttles between the Port of Gothenburg and logistic locations in Sweden and Norway.  Containers can be collected within 30 minutes of unloading.  1.5 hours from open sea to quayside.  Excellent bunker service including low-sulphur bunker.  Focus on development in distribution via rail and road.  24-hour service.  Two separate, wide fairways contribute to a safe approach.  10 berths with a water depth tp 14.2 metres.

Company description: CFI nasce nel 2007, dalla iniziativa dell'Amministratore Delegato Giacomo di Patrizi e da un gruppo di imprenditori privati che hanno creduto nelle potenzialità del trasporto ferroviario ed hanno deciso di investire in questo settore. In pochi anni CFI ha saputo ritagliarsi un ruolo di primo piano nel trasporto ferroviario, raggiungendo una quota di mercato del trasporto merci di tutto rispetto che la colloca ai primi posti tra le imprese ferroviarie private. Tutto ciò grazie ad una copertura operativa capillare del territorio nazionale, che ha permesso a CFI di raggiungere i piu importanti clienti, i distretti industriali, i porti e i terminal intermodali Italiani. Ad oggi, siamo la principale azienda ferroviaria italiana a capitale completamente privato. Offriamo ai nostri clienti servizi di trasporto ferroviario affidabili, flessibili ed al giusto prezzo.  Abbiamo una flotta di 600 carri ferroviari e un parco locomotive Siemens nuovissime.

Company description: Córas Iompair Éireann (CIÉ) is a commercial semi-state company and the largest provider of public transport services in Ireland.  In excess of 281 million passenger journeys are undertaken annually on the CIÉ network and the group employs over 10,000 people nationwide. CIÉ provides services through its subsidiary companies: Bus Átha Cliath / Dublin Bus (https://www.dublinbus.ie) provides bus services in the greater Dublin area  Bus Éireann (https://www.buseireann.ie) provides intercity and regional bus services outside of Dublin as well as city bus services in Cork, Galway, Limerick and Waterford Iarnród Éireann  / Irish Rail (https://www.irishrail.ie) provide Intercity, commuter and DART rail services throughout the country and jointly together with Northern Irish Railways the Dublin to Belfast Enterprise Service  In addition, CIÉ Tours (https://www.cietours.com) is Ireland and Britain’s largest tour operator offering inclusive and fully guided vacations into Ireland and the UK.  CIÉ is proud of the part we continue to play in the provision of public services the difficult times of Covid-19 and grateful for the efforts of all members of staff across the group during this time. Through the operation of our public transport services, the development of our lands based upon Transport Orientated Development principles and the roll out of our new Sustainability Strategy, we will play an increasingly important role in contributing to the State’s economic, environmental and social goals especially during the recovery phase from Covid-19.

Company description: Sectorinstituut Transport en Logistiek (STL) is een organisatie die zich richt op het verbeteren van de instroom en het behoud van personeel in de transport- en logistieksector. Opgericht door en voor de sector, biedt STL ondersteuning aan werkzoekenden, studenten, werknemers en werkgevers door hen te helpen bij het vinden van banen, het kiezen van opleidingen en het ontwikkelen van vaardigheden. De missie van STL is om mensen met plezier aan het werk te laten gaan en te blijven, terwijl ze ook de vitaliteit, veiligheid en ontwikkeling van medewerkers bevorderen. STL werkt samen met diverse partners en organisaties om een breed scala aan diensten aan te bieden, waaronder werving, training en advies, gericht op het creëren van een duurzame en inclusieve arbeidsmarkt. Hun klanten omvatten zowel individuele werkzoekenden en studenten als bedrijven die actief zijn in de transport- en logistieksector.

Company description: Eisenbahnen Und Verkehrsbetriebe Elbe-Weser GmbH (evb) is a transportation company that operates bus and rail services in the Elbe-Weser region of Germany. With a focus on customer service, evb offers various ticket purchasing options, including online sales and direct purchases from bus drivers, ensuring accessibility for all passengers. The company collaborates with regional transport associations, such as the Verkehrsverbund Bremen/Niedersachsen (VBN), to integrate its services within broader public transport networks. Targeting both local commuters and travelers, evb strives to meet the diverse needs of its clientele while contributing to the development of regional transport infrastructure.

With our dedicated locomotives equipped with the required safety systems we operate in the Netherlands, Germany and Belgium.  Because of our unique strategy we have become the leading independent rail service provider in the Port of Rotterdam and on the main corridors towards the German and Belgium borders. ‘At RRF, customers are the focus of our operations. This will result in cost reduction and higher margin for the customer.’ A lean organization, designed to be close to our customers Our staff is well-educated and trained to meet your requirements, with the capacity to deal with almost any situation. Within RRF we apply best practices to conduct business with personalized involvement and a commitment to strong relationships with our customers and other stakeholders. We have the local touch that characterizes the entrepreneurial spirit of our organization. Like we say in Rotterdam: Geen woorden maar daden……!

Company description: Bring Intermodal er Bring-spesialistenes felles løsning for miljøvennlig og kostnadseffektiv fremføring med tog. Bring Intermodal syr sammen og tilrettelegger intermodale transportløsninger for kunder med store import og eksport volumer både nasjonalt og internasjonalt. Med unik spisskompetanse og optimale løsninger for transport frakter vi varene dine over hele Norge og Europa. Vi kan tilby tog løsninger, bil løsninger med semitrailere, containere og 25,25 meter modulvogntog. Vi tilpasser oss dine behov og har hele tiden fokus på at du som kunde alltid skal ha de beste og mest effektive valgmulighetene på markedet. Konsernets målsetning er at 80 prosent av all frakt til områder med jernbane skal gå på skinner. Målbare miljøgevinster gjøres tilgjengelig for deg og dine kunder. Via miljøvennlige løsninger med høy kvalitet skaper Bring Intermodal forutsigbarhet og økt konkurransekraft for våre kunder.

Technologies: SAP, ITIL, Azure, Continu, ICT, Windows 10, Windows Server, Varnish, Microsoft Teams, SCCM, Office 365 Mail, PRINCE2, Microsoft, OneDrive, Sharepoint, Windows 8.1, Office 365, Microsoft 365, Windows 8, Windows, Schema, Apache HTTP Server, Amazon Simple Email Service, CloudFlare, Apache, jQuery, Google Hosted Libraries, reCAPTCHA, Cloudflare Bot Management, BootstrapCDN, Google Maps, Vimeo, Verloop, PHP, Laravel, Bootstrap
Company description: Ertsoverslagbedrijf Europoort C.V. (EECV) is een toonaangevende speler in de havenlogistiek, gespecialiseerd in het overslaan van bulkgoederen zoals ijzererts en kolen. Gevestigd in de Europoort van Rotterdam, opereert het bedrijf op een 100 hectare grote terminal waar jaarlijks ongeveer 24 miljoen ton grondstoffen worden verwerkt en vervoerd naar de staalindustrie in Duisburg, Duitsland. EECV, opgericht in 1967 en eigendom van thyssenkrupp Steel AG en Hüttenwerke Krupp Mannesmann GmbH, streeft naar een duurzame toekomst door bij te dragen aan de productie van groen staal met behulp van innovatieve technologieën. Het bedrijf richt zich op de ontwikkeling van zijn medewerkers door middel van interne opleidingen en groeimogelijkheden binnen diverse operationele functies. EECV bedient een breed scala aan klanten in de staalindustrie en werkt nauw samen met partners in de logistieke sector om een efficiënte en veilige afhandeling van bulkgoederen te waarborgen.

Company description: OVET BV is a leading provider of logistics services specializing in the transshipment, storage, and processing of dry bulk goods, including ores, solid fuels, biomass, and fertilizers. Established in 1957, the company is committed to delivering tailored solutions that extend beyond standard services, fostering collaboration with clients to address complex logistical challenges. With strategically located terminals in Vlissingen and Terneuzen, OVET offers seamless access to the North Sea and extensive European hinterland, ensuring efficient transport via water, rail, and road. The company prides itself on its flexibility, operating advanced mobile cranes and handling a diverse range of shipping needs, from inland vessels to capesize ships. OVET is dedicated to sustainability, actively participating in the circular economy by integrating useful by-products into its operations, contributing to a greener future. Its mission is to provide timely, complete, and high-quality services, while its vision focuses on continuous improvement and innovation in logistics solutions.

Company description: SWEG Südwestdeutsche Landesverkehrs-GmbH is a prominent transportation company based in Baden-Württemberg, specializing in providing reliable public transport services through an extensive network of buses and trains. Company description: IFE Doors Knorr-Bremse GmbH specializes in innovative boarding solutions for the railway industry, focusing on accessibility and efficiency. Their flagship product, the ZeroStepBoardingSystem, is designed to facilitate seamless access for individuals with mobility impairments or heavy luggage, addressing the challenges of boarding and alighting from trains. The company's mission is to enhance inclusivity in public transport by providing barrier-free entry systems that comply with evolving regulations. IFE's target market includes intercity and high-speed train operators, and their solutions are engineered to improve traffic flow, reduce boarding times, and increase overall reliability without the need for complex active components. With a commitment to quality and innovation, IFE Doors aims to set new standards in passenger accessibility and comfort.

Company description: Aircoach is Ireland's leading private bus and coach operator and provides a range of high frequency, quality scheduled coach services to and from Dublin City Centre and Dublin Airport.  We operate 6 key services connecting Dublin Airport with Dublin City Centre and its suburbs, as well as non-stop express services connecting Dublin Airport with Cork and Derry/L'Derry via Belfast.  Across the UK and Ireland, First's bus businesses provide approximately 2.5 million journeys a day for customers across a broad range of operating environments. This wide range of services includes commercial urban bus networks, inter urban routes, Park & Ride services, private hire, rail replacement services and further key airport connections including Heathrow RailAir, Glasgow Shuttle and Bristol International Flyer. Aircoach is committed to delivering high quality public transport services and has been instrumental in increasing the level of public transport usage in Ireland over the last number of years. We also have extensive experience of providing car park and shuttle bus services including operating all car park shuttle bus services on contract to Dublin Airport Authority. We are forecasting to carry over 2 million passengers this year on our high quality services to and from Dublin City Centre and Dublin Airport. Our current services include: Dublin Airport Bus – Dublin City Centre – Donnybrook - Leopardstown Dublin Airport Bus - Dublin City Centre  Dublin Airport Bus - Port Tunnel - Ballsbridge – Booterstown – Blackrock – Dalkey Cork - Dublin City Bus – Dublin Airport Derry/L'Derry Bus - Maghera - Belfast International Airport - Belfast – Dublin Airport – Dublin City

Company description: NERTUS Mantenimiento Ferroviario y Servicios, empresa del Grupo Siemens y Renfe, fue constituida en 2002 con el propósito de ofrecer servicios integrales de mantenimiento para material rodante ferroviario. Su creación marcó un hito en el sector, al establecer un modelo de colaboración innovador y sin precedentes en aquel momento. Actualmente, con más de 700 personas en el equipo, seguimos dedicándonos al mantenimiento de trenes en todo el territorio nacional y al desarrollo de proyectos nacionales e internacionales de diseño e implantación de sistemas de señalización ferroviaria. Nuestro compromiso sigue siendo ofrecer servicios de máxima calidad y eficiencia, orientados a la innovación y la mejora continua. En el centro está el equipo humano, que representa los valores de Nertus: honestidad, transparencia, espíritu de equipo, motivación y compromiso personal.

Locations: [Sweden, Hisings Backa, 17 Transportgatan, 422 46], [Sweden, Stockholm, Stockholm, 13 Transportvägen, 117 43], [Sweden, Hisings Backa Västra, 17 Transportgatan, 422 46], [Sweden, Skåne, Malmö]
Technologies: AWS, R, Google Font API, reCAPTCHA, Apache, jQuery, Amazon Web Services, Font Awesome, Google Fonts API, PHP, Microsoft 365, cdnjs, Open Graph, Apache HTTP Server, Cart Functionality, Google Maps
Company description: Mertz Transport AB är ett oberoende transportföretag med nationell täckning som alltid sätter kunden (BtB) i fokus.  Relationer är ryggraden inom Mertz. Vi utmanar och ifrågasätter gärna, allt med syfte att förbättra förutsättningarna för en framgångsrik lösning för både våra kunder och leverantörer. Det är just detta som är en stor anledning till att vi utvecklats och expanderat kontinuerligt sedan starten 1971. Och vi vill också gärna själva bli utmanade! Mertz utbildar och utvecklar ständigt all personal för att alltid leverera så hög kvalité och service som möjligt. Detta gör att alla på företaget känner yrkesstolthet och levererar tjänster på högsta nivå till våra kunder. Personalen på Mertz är handplockade och enbart de bästa får lov att representera oss och bära vårt namn. Mertz Transport AB har idag en bilpark med drygt 150 egna fordon anpassade till alla behov. Genom vårt distributionsnätverk erbjuder vi kompletta dörr-dörr lösningar inklusive last mile i egen regi eller med någon av våra noggrant utvalda underleverantörer. För att serva vårt nätverk har vi Crossdockverksamhet i Malmö, Göteborg och Stockholm samt ett stort antal strategiskt placerade distributionspunkter. Som ett komplement till våra transporttjänster sköter vårt affärsområde Rail driften av Malmö Kombiterminal, Vagnslastterminal samt omfattande tågväxlingstjänster i Malmöområdet. Vi kan därför stolt som ensam aktör erbjuda one-sto- shop lösningar inom järnväg i kombination vägtransport utifrån Malmö. Vi är idag cirka 280 anställda.    Mertz Transport AB skapar helt enkelt transportlösningar åt företag med krav på kvalitet och service!

Company description: Morska Agencja Gdynia one of the oldest companies in the sectors of transport and logistics operating in the Polish market. Our company guarantees delivery of cargoes to any place in the world - by sea and on land. Thanks to our long experience and creativity of our staff, Morska Agencja Gdynia is a brand which cooperates with exporters and importers from all over the world, shipowners, shipping lines, freight forwarders, ports, maritime offices, customs and immigration, banks and financial institutions as well as insurance companies.       We organize road and sea transport of several thousand containers a year, freight vessels, arrange road and rail transport, deal with heavy and over-size goods, dry and liquid loads as well as with general cargo. Our company ensures storage and distribution of our customers' goods in modern warehouses and also provide bonded storage. The company's offer also includes offices to let. For years we have been a correspondent of protection and indemnity clubs. We work as an emergency agent for the benefit of foreign insurance associations, supporting them during settlement of claims in road, rail and sea transport. Polish Seafarers are offered attractive and safe work. Each year our company arranges about 1500 contracts for officers and ratings to the vessels of reputable shipowners from Germany, Great Britain, Denmark, Ireland, Greece and the USA. Our professional team may challenge any task related to logistics of international trade. To learn more contact with our experts: Bartłomiej Rozmus, tel: +48 58 785 37 42, handlowy@mag.pl Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MorskaAgencjaGdynia/ Youtube: http://bit.ly/2DSwHvr http://bit.ly/2DNyzGn http://bit.ly/2Fn6LFh

Company description: Unter der Marke VIAS betreiben die VIAS GmbH, VIAS Logistik GmbH und VIAS Rail GmbH unter dem Dach der familiengeführten RATH Gruppe mehrere Wettbewerbsnetze im Schienennahverkehr. Der Betrieb der VIAS begann im Jahr 2005 mit dem Gewinn der Odenwaldbahn, die bis heute betrieben wird. Seit 2010 fährt die VIAS auch auf der RheingauLinie, seit 2017 auf dem Erft-Schwalm-Netz (Linien RB 34 und RB 39) und seit 2022 auf dem Niederrhein-Netz (Linien RE 19 und RB 35). Seit Dezember 2023 betreiben wir zudem das Ruhr-Sieg-Netz. Der Hauptsitz des Unternehmens ist in Düren (Rheinland), der zweite Sitz befindet sich in Frankfurt-Griesheim (Hessen).  Auf dem Weg zu einem Job, der Sie zu immer neuen Zielen führt? Willkommen im Team der VIAS. Seit knapp 20 Jahren sind wir erfolgreich auf der Schiene unterwegs. Ob in Nordrhein-Westfalen, Hessen oder Rheinland-Pfalz: Unsere Netze stehen für nachhaltige Mobilität und zuverlässigen Personennahverkehr – und für eine faszinierende Arbeitswelt, die begeisterten Bahnern, Technikern, ITLern und Klimarettern vielseitige Entfaltungsspielräume bietet. Denn wir fahren nicht nur die Züge, sondern halten die Fahrzeuge auch instand und übernehmen den Fahrzeugservice. Klingt nach Zukunft? Dann los!

Company description: Presente nos cinco continentes, em mais de 120 países, a KLOG Logística é uma empresa cem por cento nacional, a operar no setor da logística e transporte há 11 anos. Com uma rede de três agências, com 200 colaboradores, no mercado nacional e uma vasta rede internacional de parceiros e agentes, a KLOG garante soluções globais, integradas e personalizadas, atuando em diferentes segmentos: terrestre, marítimo, aéreo, multimodal (short sea e rail) e logística contratual. Depois de, em 2022, ter atingido uma faturação que ultrapassou a barreira dos 100 milhões de euros, a empresa está focada num futuro cada vez mais sustentável, reforçando a aposta nas soluções intermodais. Ao apostar em parcerias com operadores de referência a nível internacional, a KLOG oferece cada vez mais possibilidades de transporte intermodal – em particular por via marítima e ferroviária –, garantindo soluções de transporte mais vantajosas em termos de tempo, custo e, acima de tudo, ambientalmente mais verdes -- KLOG is a Portuguese company, that operates in in the logistics and transport sector for ten years, in more than 120 countries on the five continents. With 200 employees in the national market and an international network of partners and agents, KLOG ensures global, integrated and customized solutions, operating in different segments: land, sea, air, multimodal (short sea and rail) and contractual logistics.  After reaching a turnover of over 100 million euros in 2022, the company is focused on an increasingly sustainable future, reinforcing its commitment to intermodal solutions. Promoting more partnerships with international operators, KLOG aims to offer more possibilities for intermodal transport – by sea and rail –, ensuring better transport solutions in timing and costs, as well as environmentally friendly.

Company description: QLS Pakketdienst & Fulfilment is dertig jaar geleden in Dordrecht opgericht en is van origine een familiebedrijf wat met veel passie en zorg haar intrede heeft gemaakt in de branche van logistieke e-commerce. QLS typeert zich als een organisatie die stapsgewijs toonaangevende en innovatieve ontwikkelingen heeft doorgemaakt en daardoor heeft uit kunnen groeien tot het vooruitstrevende logistieke e-commerce bedrijf wat het nu is.  QLS streeft er middels haar twee typerende dienstverleningen naar om al haar klanten binnen de e-commerce te kunnen bedienen, ondersteunen en te ontzorgen. Middels de pakketdienst dienstverlening ondersteunt QLS webshops met het verzenden van uw pakketten. Door de gratis ophaalservice, het eigen ontwikkelde verzendplatform en de snelle verzending, waarbij pakketten de volgende dag voor zowel Nederland als België worden bezorgd, is Pakketdienst QLS uw logistieke verlengstuk van uw webshop.  QLS Fulfilment ontzorgt uw webshop door het gehele logistieke proces uit handen te nemen. Alle processen met betrekking tot inslag, opslag, orderpicken, inpakken, verzenden en retouren worden geheel door QLS overgenomen. Ons vooruitstrevende DNA maakt het mogelijk dat QLS constant in beweging is en de processen kan optimaliseren en automatiseren. Hierdoor kunnen wij bestellingen razend snel verwerken en verzenden. Door onze familiaire insteek, persoonlijke betrokkenheid en vooruitstrevende werkwijze is zowel QLS Fulfilment als Pakketdienst QLS uw ideale logistiek partner.

Company description: Veenstra|Fritom ontzorgt en creëert logistieke rust voor u. Wij zijn al bijna 100 jaar uw partner in transport,  warehousing , logistieke oplossingen, zeevracht en luchtvracht. Met onze oplossingsgerichtheid, flexibiliteit en persoonlijke communicatie, zorgen wij voor het grote verschil als uw logistieke partner. Door ons totaalaanbod aan diensten nemen wij u het volledige logistieke proces uit handen. Veenstra|Fritom levert logistieke rust aan bijna 1000 relaties.  Kiest u ook voor volledige ontzorging en overweegt u het uitbesteden van uw logistieke proces? Veenstra|Fritom zorgt ervoor dat u er geen omkijken meer naar heeft. Met de juiste kennis in huis, verlopen de logistieke processen gemakkelijk en flexibel. Zo kunt u de focus houden op waar u goed in bent en doen wij de rest. Onze relaties waarderen onze betrouwbare en solide oplossingen. Medewerkers zijn trots -grutsk- om bij Veenstra|Fritom te werken en zetten zich altijd voor de volle 100 procent voor u in. We staan open voor anderen, zijn vriendelijk en gaan altijd voor een eersteklas resultaat. Fritom staat voor dé slimme en innovatieve logistieke dienstverleners die altijd op zoek zijn naar de beste logistieke oplossingen. Dit doen we door nauw samen te werken met onze zusterbedrijven. De fakkeldrager op het gebied van logistieke dienstverlening, dat wil de Fritom Group zijn. Daarbij staan we in de top 30 van de logistieke dienstverleners in Nederland. Deel van uitmaken? Bekijk ook eens: werkenbijveenstrafritom.nl

Company description: Styrsöbolaget är för de flesta göteborgare ett välkänt rederi och ett starkt varumärke - vi ligger i topp i Västtrafiks mätningar av resenärers upplevelse av service och kvalitet. Vår huvudverksamhet är passagerartrafik i Göteborgs södra skärgård och hamn som vi kör på uppdrag av Västtrafik. Vår flotta består av 19 fartyg och varje år reser ca 5,5 miljoner passagerare i södra skärgården och i älvtrafiken. På uppdrag av Göteborgs stad kör vi även frakttrafiken med gods och nyttofordon från Fiskebäck till Södra skärgården. Vårt senaste tillskott, Västtrafiks nya, elhybridfärja ELVY förväntas minska bränsleförbrukningen kraftigt. Styrsöbolaget ingår sedan 2004 som ett dotterbolag i @Transdev Sverige AB , som är verksamma inom trafikslagen båt, buss, spårvagn och tåg. Transdev kör både upphandlad och kommersiell trafik. Välkommen att resa med oss!

Company description: Be it aboard the São Paulo metro or on the Venice Simplon-Orient-Express: our ideas travel the whole world on over 10,000 vehicles. We develop and manufacture innovative power electronics for global railway transportation with great accuracy and a lot of passion: every day, our more than 160 employees contribute to changing the market of a forward-looking branch. What we do We develop and manufacture innovative auxiliary power converters for international rolling stock. Our product portfolio ranges from single devices such as battery chargers or air conditioning inverters to complete auxiliary power converters for passenger cars and multiple-unit trains.  We are a subsidiary of Beijing Dinghan Technology Group Co., Ltd. and are headquartered in Kassel, in the very center of Germany.

Name: Naar Bespoke Travel
Technologies: ECC, Network Solutions DNS, Centro, IIS, Google Font API, AngularJS, TypeScript, Windows Server, Angular, Cybot, jQuery, Font Awesome, Google Tag Manager, Google Analytics, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft ASP.NET, Stripe, Cookiebot, Microsoft IIS, Google Fonts API, Bootstrap, Microsoft 365

Company description: Naar Bespoke Tavel è un tour operator con sede a Milano specializzato in viaggi su misura e pacchetti dinamici fondata nel 1996 da Frederic Naar.  Fin dagli albori, NAAR si è contraddistinto sul mercato per la componente tecnologica a servizio delle agenzie di viaggio, il supporto professionale del team, l’attenzione ai dettagli e la selezione di partner di qualità.  Nel panorama italiano si conferma come il punto di riferimento per la costruzione di viaggi su misura, viaggi di nozze, fly & drive, fly & train, viaggi multi-destinazione, in Nord e Sud America, Caraibi, Messico, Europa, Penisola Arabica, Africa, Oceano Indiano, Asia, Oceania e Oceano Pacifico.  Tradizionale ma con spirito innovativo, NAAR declina l'eleganza e l’esperienza in viaggi su misura di medio e alto profilo, e per adattarsi alle tendenze del settore e anticipare le esigenze dei viaggiatori rinnova costantemente l'esclusivo software che rende il processo di creazione dei viaggi semplice, veloce ed intuitivo. La sinergia di esperti product manager, team di prenotazione, programmatori e un’ampia rete vendite, fa di NAAR uno dei più rinomati ed affidabili tour operator italiani.  La sede centrale è a Milano, con filiali operative a Roma, Napoli e Palermo, mentre dal 2019 ha esteso il suo modello di business al mercato francese, e dal 2024 ha aperto in Germania e in Benelux.

Company description: Grupa Delta Trans is a comprehensive logistics and transportation company specializing in both domestic and international freight services. With a fleet of approximately 300 vehicles, the company offers a wide range of transport solutions, including full truckload (FCL) and less-than-truckload (LCL) shipments, as well as sea, air, rail, and road freight services. The company's mission is to enhance workplace safety and minimize occupational hazards, as evidenced by their recent project aimed at improving air quality in welding environments. Company description: Tamoil Nederland B.V. is een toonaangevende speler op de Nederlandse brandstofmarkt, met meer dan 225 tankstations verspreid over het land en een ambitie om te groeien naar 300 locaties. Sinds de oprichting in 1993 onder de merknaam Tamoil, heeft het bedrijf zich gericht op het leveren van hoogwaardige brandstoffen en een uitstekende klantenservice. Tamoil streeft ernaar om een duurzame en klantgerichte ervaring te bieden, waarbij het gebruik van technologie, zoals de Tamoil app, klanten extra voordelen en kortingen biedt. Het bedrijf werkt samen met diverse partners en is actief betrokken bij maatschappelijke initiatieven, zoals het ondersteunen van kankeronderzoek via evenementen als Alpe d'HuZes. Tamoil richt zich op zowel particuliere als zakelijke klanten, en biedt hen een breed scala aan producten en diensten, waaronder tankpassen en loyaliteitsprogramma's.

Met onze toegewijde mensen, ons moderne wagenpark, onze uitstekende service én slimme automatisering ontzorgen wij u volledig. Flexibiliteit, transparantie en een hoge kwaliteit staan daarbij voorop. Name: Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten
Technologies: Microsoft Azure, HSTS, Google Analytics, Open Graph, jQuery, Vue.js, Webpack, Nuxt.js, Cart Functionality, Facebook, Node.js, X-XSS-Protection
Company description: Wagenborg is een onderdeel van het familiebedrijf Royal Wagenborg, waarvan het hoofdkantoor in Delfzijl is gevestigd. Jaarlijks vervoeren wij met onze veerboten, watertaxi's en sneldienst ruim 1,5 miljoen passagiers en zo’n 200.000 auto's en vrachtauto’s. Een ambitieuze veerdienst die al meer dan een eeuw ieder seizoen passagiers van en naar de Waddeneilanden Ameland en Schiermonnikoog vervoert. En dat in een ongeëvenaard dynamisch natuurgebied. Veilig en verantwoord varen op Werelderfgoed de Waddenzee met respect voor de natuur. Dat zien we terug in alles: in ons beleid, in onze werkwijze en in onze medewerkers die graag de handen uit de mouwen steken. In april 2014 heeft de Minister van Infrastructuur en Milieu aan Wagenborg Passagiersdiensten voor de looptijd van 15 jaar de Concessie Waddenveren Oost verleend. Al met al zijn wij al ruim een eeuw een betrouwbare partner van de overheid. Ook na 2029 willen wij de concessie graag behouden. Daarom leggen wij de lat steeds een beetje hoger als het gaat om het niveau van service, kwaliteit, veiligheid en klantentevredenheid. Wij willen dat onze passagiers zich prettig voelen aan boord en varen met eersteklas materiaal. Veiligheid, kwaliteit en continuïteit staan voorop. Daar kunnen onze reizigers en medewerkers op rekenen.

Company description: WECON GmbH is a specialist in commercial vehicles and container technology. Our company is one of the leading manufacturers of swap bodies and trailers for intermodal transport. WECON develops customised solutions for transport by road and rail. Our employees advise customers throughout Europe and design, produce and assemble products in Westphalian Ascheberg as well as in Strumień in Poland. Besides These core competencies, our family-run, medium-sized Business is committed to producing versatile, high-volume vehicles characterised by their extremely low design and high load capacity. When customers come to us, they get customised vehicles with swap or rigid bodies. Qualified engineers and mechanics work at WECON on the basis of a proven modular system that is flexibly structured to meet the needs of Transport companies. Quality and variety are among the central cornerstones of WECON production. The product range includes high-volume swap bodies, swap boxes, swap systems for motor vehicles, swap trailers, container chassis, high-volume swap containers, semi-trailers and high-volume vehicles, plus multiply stackable containers for road, rail and water transport. WECON builds variants in accordance with individual customer requests. The company built its reputation on swap bodies for intermodal transport by road and rail.

Neben den innerwerklichen Eisenbahntransporten an den Stahlstandorten Salzgitter, Peine und Ilsenburg, führt VPS zahlreiche bundesweite Transporte für die Stahlgesellschaften des Konzerns durch. Die rd. 700 Mitarbeiter der VPS bewegen mit aktuell 57 Lokomotiven und etwa 1.800 Güterwagen etwa 42 Mio. t Güter auf der Schiene pro Jahr.  Die VPS zählt zu den bedeutendsten und zu den erfahrensten Eisenbahnverkehrsunternehmen Deutschlands. Sie stellt das zehntgrößte von ca. 150 deutschen Eisenbahnunternehmen dar und verfügt über ein jahrzehntelanges Praxis-Know-How. Neben den zahlreichen Logistikdienstleistungen, betreibt die VPS den Binnen- und Industriehafen in Salzgitter Beddingen und wirkt bei der Entwicklung innovativer Eisenbahntechniken mit.

Name: Koleje Małopolskie
Technologies: Google Maps, Lightbox, HSTS, Select2, Apache HTTP Server, Facebook Pixel, X-Content-Type-Options, Open Graph, Google Ads Conversion Tracking, Figma, Adobe, Facebook, Laravel, Adobe Creative Suite, PHP, Microsoft 365, Bootstrap, Google Fonts API, Ubuntu, Google Analytics, Apache, reCAPTCHA, Google Ads, Java, Google Tag Manager, jQuery
Company description: Koleje Małopolskie sp. z o.o. to polski przewoźnik multimodalny, który rozpoczął działalność w 2014 roku, po uzyskaniu licencji na przewozy kolejowe. Firma obsługuje regularne połączenia kolejowe w Małopolsce, w tym trasy łączące Kraków z Wieliczką, Miechowem, Tarnowem oraz innymi miastami, a także wprowadza innowacyjne rozwiązania transportowe, takie jak Małopolskie Linie Dowozowe. Misją Kolei Małopolskich jest zapewnienie komfortowego, ekologicznego i dostępnego transportu dla mieszkańców oraz turystów, co potwierdzają rosnące liczby pasażerów, które w 2023 roku przekroczyły 60 milionów. Współpracując z lokalnymi samorządami i instytucjami, firma dąży do rozwoju infrastruktury transportowej w regionie, a jej oferta skierowana jest zarówno do codziennych podróżnych, jak i grup zorganizowanych. Koleje Małopolskie stawiają na nowoczesność, wprowadzając nowoczesne pojazdy oraz udogodnienia dla osób z niepełnosprawnościami, co czyni ich usługi bardziej dostępnymi dla wszystkich.

Company description: Your specialist in fresh logistics, warehousing & new and used trailers Wezenberg Transport Wezenberg Transport Is een transportbedrijf dat zich heeft gespecialiseerd in het geconditioneerd vervoeren en distribueren van AGF producten en levensmiddelen, zowel nationaal als internationaal. Het moderne en goed onderhouden wagenpark voldoet aan de laatste eisen op het gebied van milieu, geluid en veiligheid. Verder is zij in het bezit  van diverse certificaten zoals HACCP en GMP. Ook heeft Wezenberg Transport een Lean and Green award mogen ontvangen. Deze award vormt een erkenning voor de inspanningen die Wezenberg levert om de CO2 uitstoot tussen 2010 en 2015 te reduceren met minimaal 20%. Agrarisch Logistiek Centrum Agrarisch Logistiek Centrum IJsselmuiden (ALC) is een op- en overslag bedrijf gespecialiseerd in de bewaring en handling van geconditioneerde producten. ALC heeft de beschikking over Ultra Low Oxygen (ULO)  cellen voor langdurige bewaring van o.a. appels en peren, maar ook mechanische koelruimte is ruimschoots aanwezig. Tevens beschikt ALC over opslagcapaciteit van 35.000 palletplaatsen ten behoeve van droge goederen. Voor meermalige verpakkingen (fusten) heeft ALC een drietal industriële wasmachines. ALC is HACCP gecertificeerd. Wezenberg Atrop Verkoop van nieuwe en gebruikte opleggers, vrachtwagens en aanhangwagens. Nieuwe opleggers worden op klantwens samengesteld.

Name: Eisenbahn-Bundesamt EBA
Locations: [Germany, North Rhine-westphalia, Bonn], [Germany, Bavaria, Munich, 9 Arnulfstraße, 80335]
Technologies: Python
Company description: Das Eisenbahn-Bundesamt (EBA) ist die zentrale Aufsichtsbehörde für die Eisenbahninfrastruktur in Deutschland. Es hat die Aufgabe, die Sicherheit, Effizienz und Qualität des Schienenverkehrs zu gewährleisten, indem es die Einhaltung von gesetzlichen Vorgaben und technischen Standards überwacht. Die Mission des EBA besteht darin, eine sichere, zuverlässige und umweltfreundliche Eisenbahninfrastruktur zu fördern, die den Anforderungen der Nutzer und der Gesellschaft gerecht wird. Zu den Hauptkunden des EBA zählen Eisenbahnunternehmen, Infrastrukturbetreiber sowie staatliche Stellen, die im Bereich des Schienenverkehrs tätig sind. Das EBA arbeitet eng mit Partnern wie der Deutschen Bahn AG und anderen Verkehrsunternehmen zusammen, um die Herausforderungen der modernen Mobilität zu bewältigen und die Schieneninfrastruktur nachhaltig zu entwickeln. Die Zielgruppe des EBA umfasst sowohl öffentliche als auch private Eisenbahnbetreiber sowie regionale und nationale Verkehrsbehörden, die auf die Expertise des EBA angewiesen sind, um ihre Infrastrukturprojekte erfolgreich umzusetzen. Durch die Implementierung von Regulierungsrahmen und Investitionsstrategien zielt das EBA darauf ab, die Qualität und Kapazität der Schienenverkehrsdienste zu verbessern. Das EBA spielt eine entscheidende Rolle bei der Genehmigung und Überwachung von Eisenbahninfrastrukturprojekten, um die Sicherheit und Effizienz des Schienenverkehrs zu gewährleisten. Darüber hinaus fördert das EBA Innovationen und Modernisierungen im Schienenverkehr, um die Wettbewerbsfähigkeit und Nachhaltigkeit des Sektors zu steigern. Die Vision des EBA konzentriert sich auf die kontinuierliche Verbesserung der Qualität und Zuverlässigkeit des Schienenverkehrs, um den Bedürfnissen der Passagiere und der Gesellschaft gerecht zu werden. Durch umfassende Inspektions- und Bewertungsprozesse trägt das EBA zur Aufrechterhaltung der Integrität des deutschen Schienennetzes bei und unterstützt die Entwicklung eines modernen und integrierten Verkehrssystems.

Shareholdings are through Rubis Terminal (a storage operator wholly owned by RUBIS), MITSUI & CO. Europe PLC, and Intercontinental Terminals Company “ITC” (a petrochemical storage terminal company based in Houston, USA - ITC is wholly owned by Mitsui).  Recently, Mitsui acquired full ownership of the facility and rebanded the company to ITC Antwerp NV. We are located in the port of Antwerp on the left bank of the River Scheldt at the Doel Dock, near the entrance of the Deurganck Dock with excellent access to sea, road and rail infrastructure. We have been in operation since October 2010. Our terminal is equipped in accordance with the latest standards for the storage and transhipment of liquid chemicals, liquefied gas and petroleum products. For more information, please visit our website www.itcantwerp.com

Its key mission is the strategic and operational planning, coordination and control of the public transport carried out by (ground and underground) public transport means in the Attica Region. O.A.S.A. S.A. was established under Law 2175/1993 (Α΄211) and is subject to Law 3920/2011 (A' 33), Law 3429/2005 (A' 314), Law 4389 / 2016 (A' 94) and Law 4548/2018 (A' 104). O.A.S.A. S.A. is the sole shareholder (participation rate 100%) of its subsidiaries transport companies O.SY. S.A. and STA.SY. S.A. The three companies constitute the O.A.S.A. Group. • OSY S.A. is the distinctive title of the company called “Road Transport S.A.”, that provides urban transportation services with thermal and trolley buses in the Attica Region. • STA.SY S.A. is the distinctive title of the company called “Urban Rail Transport S.A”, that provides urban transportation services with metro, underground and tram in the Attica Region. In accordance with the provisions of article 380 of Law 4512/2018, O.A.S.A. S.A. shares (and its subsidiaries O.SY. S.A. and STA.SY. S.A) are owned by the HELLENIC CORPORATION OF ASSETS & PARTICIPATIONS S.A. (HCAP S.A.) after a transfer from the Greek State.

Company description: In der GRE German Rail Engineering GmbH sind seit über 35 Jahren alle Kompetenzen für die Planung komplexer Eisenbahn- und Straßeninfrastrukturprojekte gebündelt: Mit Ingenieurbauwerken, Verkehrsanlagen des Schienen- und Straßenverkehrs, bahntechnischer Ausrüstung und Hochbauten bearbeitet die GRE German Rail Engineering sämtliche Schlüsselgewerke im eigenen Haus. Kompetenz im Projektmanagement sowie Consultingleistungen runden das Portfolio ab. Einsparungen bei gleichbleibend hoher Qualität, Schonung von Ressourcen und die Minimierung von Betriebs- und Unterhaltungsaufwendungen sind Herausforderungen, denen wir uns ebenso stellen wie der Verwirklichung einer technisch innovativen, dauerhaften und sicheren Anlage.  Wir sind Teil von Dorsch Europe, die mit gut 1.500 Mitarbeitenden an 26 Standorten zu den großen Ingenieurdienstleistern in Europa gehört. Gemeinsam mit unseren Kunden und dem kollektiven Wissen unserer weltweit über 7.500 Expertinnen und Experten gestalten wir unter dem Dach von Dorsch Global nachhaltige Lebensräume für die heutige und die kommenden Generationen.

Name: Societatea De Transport București STB S.A.
Locations: [Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 1 Bulevardul Dinicu Golescu]
HQ Location: Romania, Bucureşti, Bucharest, Nr. 1 Bulevardul Dinicu Golescu
Company description: With over 150 years of experience, Societatea de Transport Bucharest STB S.A. is the largest operator of public surface transport in Romania and also the main operator of public surface transport in the Municipality of Bucharest and Ilfov County, having one of the most extensive transport networks in Europe, with a route length of 1651 km double track . As the main transport operator, STB SA is able to meet the various mobility needs of citizens through a wide range of transport services provided with a fleet of approximately 2000 vehicles (buses, trolleybuses and trams), in recent years investments have been made major both in the renewal of the inclusive fleet with hybrid buses, and in the adoption of modern, digitized payment and information solutions aimed at increasing the quality of the transport services offered. The tariff offer was made more flexible by implementing the concept of metropolitan lines (which brings together all urban, regional and express lines), as well as by applying the time tariff, creating several types of subscriptions and integrating the tariff offer with that of Metrorex, but also with the train in within a pilot project implemented on the Bucharest - Otopeni link. To pay for travel, STB S.A. uses a modern charging system, based on contactless card technology. Also, payment for the trip can be made via SMS, through the 24Pay mobile application, as well as with the contactless bank card. At the same time, to improve the travel experience, STB S.A. made the InfoTB app available to users for real-time travel planning, including information on metro connections. The mission of STB S.A. is to provide surface urban public transport services for the citizens of the Capital, guided by sustainability criteria, contributing to a development that responds to mobility needs in a dynamic continuum.

Company description: Evofenedex is een invloedrijk kennis- en adviescentrum dat zich richt op de groei van duurzame handel en toekomstbestendige logistieke ketens. Opgericht in 2017, verenigt het meer dan 10.000 leden die actief zijn in de logistiek en internationale handel, variërend van grote chipmachinefabrikanten tot bedrijven die bijen internationaal versturen. De missie van Evofenedex is om kennis om te zetten in kunde, met een sterke focus op mens en milieu, en om leden te ondersteunen bij het navigeren door de uitdagingen van digitalisering, verduurzaming en geopolitieke veranderingen. Het bedrijf biedt een breed scala aan diensten, waaronder kennisdeling, lobbywerk en innovatieve producten, en werkt samen met Europese partners om de belangen van zijn leden te behartigen. Evofenedex streeft ernaar om een sterke positionering van de handel en logistiek te realiseren door collectieve actie en samenwerking binnen de sector.

Company description: Frigo Group Logistics is een toonaangevende speler in de sector van koel- en vriestransport, met een sterke focus op het waarborgen van de kwaliteit van diepvriesproducten. Met een vrieshuis in Nieuw-Vennep en een breed scala aan logistieke diensten, waaronder volledige ladingen, groupage en palletvervoer, bedient het bedrijf klanten door heel Europa, met speciale expertise in geconditioneerd vervoer naar Spanje en Portugal. De missie van Frigo Group is om klantgerichte oplossingen te bieden die voldoen aan de unieke eisen van hun klanten, terwijl ze tegelijkertijd de hoogste kwaliteitsnormen handhaven door middel van uitgebreide certificeringen en training van personeel. Het bedrijf investeert voortdurend in innovatie en duurzaamheid, met geavanceerde technologieën en energiezuinige voertuigen om de ecologische voetafdruk te verkleinen. Frigo Group werkt nauw samen met diverse klanten, waaronder Hekos Oriental Food, en richt zich op het opbouwen van langdurige relaties gebaseerd op vertrouwen en wederzijds voordeel. Door hun flexibele en efficiënte aanpak zijn ze goed gepositioneerd om te voldoen aan de groeiende eisen van de markt en de uitdagingen van de toekomst aan te gaan.

Company description: No 1 in the Nordic Region As the leading neutral consolidator in the Nordic region, we are proud to offer the most extensive number of direct services to and from the Nordics. With offices in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, and our own warehouses in Gothenburg, Sweden as well as local terminals in each country, Nordicon organizes the consolidation of freight to more than 500 export destinations, and from more than 300 import locations around the world. Besides its core LCL (Less than Container Load) business on ocean and rail with focus on direct consolidation services, Nordicon also offers FCL (Full Container Load) and a range of other transport-related services such as warehousing, air freight, and trucking. With tailored solutions for forwarders, FCS, we create a logistic chain and monitor cargo flows to match our customers’ specific needs and requirements. “No 1” does not only mean that we have the most competitive range of services, but also that we are dominant in IT solutions as well as customer service. Our aim and promise to our customers are to constantly strive for development and improved service. To learn more about our services and what we can offer, please visit www.nordic-on.com, or contact us directly and we will explain why our services are such a popular choice! Welcome to our world of consolidation!

Company description: GTS Rail is the GTS group rail division, which has been operating in liberalized market since 2008. Its mission consists in providing high quality and efficiency traction services both for goods and for passengers. Today's "real" level of liberalization allows to provide services only for goods. GTS services are addressed to any kind of train and customer. GTS Rail aims at becoming a best practice in the railway world, which, unfortunately, is still characterised by the presence of public, semi-public, national and foreigner subjects. Efficiency and quality are at the basis of our operational model: they do not remain abstract concepts, rather they pervade our everyday work, values and corporate culture.  When thinking at railways, the ensuing image and sensation are negative, by definition, since many companies and people have experienced dramatic or even disastrous situations. GTS has the strong will to reverse the common idea of railways as a second-rate, low-quality and obsolete system. We operate in a 100-years-old market showing a great potential, which has not managed to express itself yet. Suffice it to think that only 4% of goods is transported by train, and the transport of people is inefficient. "GTS Rail perfectly knows which is the key factor to become a successful company. The railway world is characterised by an incredible passion: our aim is to let all of our co-workers express such passion. If we manage, this means we will have achieved our challenging goals".

Company description: EVM Rail intende sviluppare e promuovere servizi ferroviari e ricercare nuove soluzioni di trasporto su rotaia da offrire ai propri clienti come alternativa vantaggiosa ed ecologica alle altre forme di trasporto, come per esempio quello su gomma. EVM Rail si propone come un’Impresa Ferroviaria estremamente snella, focalizzata e notevolmente specializzata nella produzione di treni tradizionali completi trasportanti merci rappresentate prevalentemente da materie prime (come per esempio i cereali, il ferro, ecc.), senza escludere dal proprio business la possibilità di effettuare il trasporto intermodale di unità di traffico combinato (contenitori, semirimorchi stradali ecc). EVM Rail è in grado di offrire ai propri clienti, grazie all’esperienza pluriennale dei propri esperti ferroviari, servizi di consulenza con l’obiettivo ricercare nuove sinergie e soluzioni innovative.

Company description: Simwave is a company active in operating comprehensive maritime simulation training centres equipped with simulators based on world-leading simulation technology.  Our customers require training or assessing on simulators and do not choose to develop and maintain own in-house simulators for various reasons. By using our own naval architects and a team of 3D modellers, Simwave offer you facilities where you can use your own mathematical ship models in your own port-environment. Bring your own instructors, we take care of all technical, operational and hospitality support. Simwave centres are flexible centres, it adapts to your own corporate branding.  Our focus is not only on the navigation, engine and ship management related training but also on the emergency response training on board of cruise ships, such as advanced firefighting -and crowd control training. Because of the fast-growing technology, we have made it possible to integrate these applications.  Simwave operates global and independently and will fully relieve customers by running best-of-class facilities. It is a one stop shop for certified maritime training and we can offer the full scope of possibilities: hiring our facilities or a turnkey solution, all tailor made to your requirements and expectations. Your crew will love to train!

Company description: Sedert de oprichting van MOL in 1944 profileert ons bedrijf zich als een onderneming die technische uitdagingen niet uit de weg gaat, meer nog dit is ons handelsmerk geworden. Actieve productontwikkeling, een innovatieve aanpak en doorgedreven internationalisering hebben het bedrijf gemaakt tot wat het nu is: meer dan 400 gedreven werknemers die samen instaan voor de realisatie van een hoogwaardig productgamma. Een team van gespecialiseerde technici staat in voor de dienst-na-verkoop, in binnen- en buitenland. MOL beschikt over het ISO 9001-2008 getuigschrift, het Caterpillar Certified Supplier label en een lasproces certificatie volgens EN 15085 (lassen van spoorweg-voertuigen en componenten). Deze erkenningen zijn het resultaat van onze voortdurende kwaliteitsbewaking en constante verfijning van productiemethodes. De industriële voertuigen van MOL vinden een wereldwijde afzet: Europa, Afrika, Het Midden Oosten, het Verre Oosten, … behoren tot het actieterrein.

Company description: A MÁV-csoport a magyar állam tulajdonában lévő, 150 éves múlttal rendelkező vasúttársaság.  A folyamatosan fejlődő, mintegy 30 tagú vállalatcsoport széles körű tevékenységet folytat: többek között közel 7000 kilométernyi vasúti pályahálózat és az ahhoz kapcsolódó kiszolgáló létesítmények üzemeltetését, karbantartását, valamint a forgalom irányítását végzi, személyszállítási közszolgáltatási feladatokat lát el (naponta közel 3000 vonat, az éves utasszám megközelíti a 142 millió főt). Informatikai rendszerek teljes körű kialakítása, működtetése, és fejlesztése éppúgy a profiljába tartozik, mint a pénzügyi, számviteli és kontrolling tevékenység, valamint a humánerőforrás gazdálkodás.  A több mint 37 ezer főt foglalkoztató MÁV-csoport az ország egyik legnagyobb felelős munkaadója és gazdálkodója.

Company description: INTEREUROPA d.o.o. is a main offerer of logistic services in Republic of Croatia for 60 years. The residence of the company is located in Zegreb, Josip Lončar 3 Street, with branches in Zagreb, Varazdin, Rijeka and Split and offices in Zadar, Osijek, Kutina and Pleso. Solving complex logistic solutions we base on the collaboration with the reliable partners all around Europe and World, verified personnel, as well as with highly trained employees with professional knowledge from different logistic fields and complete technological an IT support. We reassure the whole mosaic of logistic services which include road, rail, air, sea, express delivery, warehousing and custom services. INTEREUROPA d.o.o. is a regular member of FIATA (International Federation of Freight Forwarders Associations), IATA ( International Air Transport Association) and WCA ( world's largest and most powerful network of independent freight forwarders). INTEREUROPA d.o.o. vodeći je ponuđač logističkih usluga u Republici Hrvatskoj s tradicijom od 60 godina. Sjedište tvrtke nalazi se u Zagrebu, Josipa Lončara 3, s podružnicama u Zagrebu, Varaždinu, Rijeci i Splitu, poslovnicama u Zadru i Osijeku te ispostavama Kutina i Pleso.  Rješavanje kompleksnih logističkih rješenja temeljimo na suradnji s našim provjerenim partnerima širom Europe i svijeta,  provjerenoj kadrovskoj strukturi, na visoko osposobljenim zaposlenicima sa stručnim znanjima iz različitih logističkih područja te na cjelovitoj tehnološkoj i informatičkoj potpori. Osiguravamo cijelu lepezu logističkih usluga koje uključuju cestovni, željeznički, zračni, pomorski i expressni promet, skladišne i carinske sluge.  Redovni smo članovi FIATA (Međunarodnog udruženja međunarodnih otpremnika), IATA (Međunarodne udruga za zračni prijevoz) te WCA  kao najveće mreže neovisnih špeditera na svijetu.

Company description: NEXTRAIL GmbH is a leading consultancy firm specializing in the railway sector, providing strategic and technical expertise to enhance rail infrastructure and operations. With a mission to drive innovation and efficiency in railway systems, NEXTRAIL focuses on developing technologies and strategies that support both conventional and digital signaling and safety systems. The company serves a diverse clientele, including major railway operators and infrastructure managers, and collaborates with industry partners to implement cutting-edge solutions such as the European Train Control System (ETCS) and Automatic Train Operation (ATO). NEXTRAIL's team comprises seasoned experts with extensive experience in management consulting, project management, and system integration, ensuring high-quality service delivery across various projects. The firm is committed to advancing the future of rail transport through sustainable practices and technological advancements, positioning itself as a key player in the digital transformation of the railway industry.

Company description: We are a versatile company, constantly evolving and developing, which has been operating throughout Europe since 2007. We cover all of our customers’ specific requirements for transport and logistics, meeting the most demanding quality standards. We use our own fleet of over 200 trucks plus semitrailers to provide express and standard (one way and round trip) transport services throughout Europe. We also provide personalised consultancy services for dangerous goods transport plans in accordance with the laws in force. Storage, goods management, order processing and stock management. We plan and manage any type of air, sea, rail or intermodal transport route. We carry out the entire design and development process for our turnkey projects. One of our specialities, in which we have more than 13 years of experience, is the express transport of full truck loads. We ensure minimum transit times for long distances thanks to our two-driver system, which makes our flows faster and more efficient. We consider quality one of the strategic pillars of our entire business. It enables us to provide exclusive services for the most demanding sectors. Day after day we further the implementation of exhaustive quality controls, in order to improve all our processes, always meeting our customers’ specific requirements.

Company description: Comodality Group is a logistics company providing full range of logistics services, including airfreight, ocean freight (LCL/FCL), trucking, rail solutions, warehousing, customs clearance and many related services. The name Comodality stems from a notion introduced by the European commission in 2006 in the field of the transport policy to define an approach of the globality of the transport modes and of their combinations. For the European commission the co-modality refers to a "use of different modes on their own and in combination" in the aim to obtain "an optimal and sustainable utilisation of resources".  Comodality was founded in Copenhagen in 2010 mainly focusing on project cargo from Scandinavia to the North American market. In 2017 the company change the strategy and focused on airfreight, ocean freight, trucking and railroad solution and other value adding services. The Comodality Group have fully owned offices in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Germany, The Baltic Countries, Czech Republic, Poland and Spain.

Company description: Szybka Kolej Miejska (SKM) działa na terenie aglomeracji warszawskiej, stanowiąc istotny element Warszawskiego Transportu Publicznego. Jest szóstym – w oparciu o liczbę pasażerów – kolejowym przewoźnikiem w Polsce. Zapewnia mieszkańcom stolicy i okolicznych gmin wygodny dojazd do pracy czy szkoły. Eksploatując nowoczesne pociągi i realizując kolejne inwestycje taborowe, oferuje atrakcyjną alternatywę wobec samochodu, zmniejszając negatywny wpływ miasta na środowisko. The company's mission is to make European travel accessible and enjoyable for everyone, promoting the convenience of train journeys as a sustainable and scenic way to experience the continent. Eurail's target market includes tourists and travelers seeking to discover Europe, particularly those interested in multi-country itineraries. The company partners with various national rail operators to offer a wide range of train connections and reservations, ensuring that clients can navigate the extensive European rail network seamlessly. With a focus on customer support and community engagement, Eurail aims to enhance the travel experience by providing valuable information and resources to its users.

Company description: Heetch started back in 2013 on the parking lots of Parisian nightclubs, where founders Teddy and Mathieu would showcase their nocturnal ride-sharing service to young customers who’d missed the last train.  One court case* and two fundraisings later**, our professional 24/24 ride-hailing app covers more than ten countries and is growing very fast, particularly in French-speaking Africa. We aim to create healthy and culturally relevant markets wherever we go, which implies guaranteeing a fair income to drivers and affordable prices to passengers… while taking care of our employees. This indisputable challenge unites the teams and keeps us going everyday! *Google it, it’s an epic story! **We are backed by €54 million raised from renowned investors and a part of the #FrenchTech120   As we are growing really fast, we have lots of job opportunities. If you are looking for a company with a strong culture and amazing values, have a look at our website! We are always looking for talented and driven people to join us.

Company description: In our growing European network, we make container transport reliable, cost-effective and sustainable. Hutchison Ports Europe Intermodal offers shipping lines, logistics service providers and shippers high frequent rail and barge services between a growing network of inland terminals and deep-sea terminals in Rotterdam and other ports. HPEI also offers many additional services, such as transport without customs documents, storage, empty depot and last mile trucking. Company description: Avis Autonoleggio Italia, part of the Avis Budget Group, is a leading car rental company in Italy, offering a comprehensive range of vehicles to meet the needs of both private and business clients. The company's mission is to provide high-quality service, ensuring flexibility and transparency in pricing, with a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction. Avis stands out with its loyalty program, Avis Preferred, which rewards frequent customers with exclusive benefits and discounts. The clientele of Avis includes individual travelers, families, and corporate clients, reflecting its ability to cater to a diverse audience. Strategic partnerships with airports and train stations enhance accessibility to rental services throughout the country, making it easier for customers to find and rent vehicles. With over 10,250 locations in Italy and worldwide, Avis Autonoleggio Italia is dedicated to making the car rental experience simple and convenient for everyone. The company aims to enhance mobility and travel experiences while prioritizing safety and reliability, ensuring that clients can trust Avis for their transportation needs. Through its commitment to exceptional service and customer care, Avis continues to solidify its position as a leader in the car rental industry.

Company description: BMF Port Burgas is a private port operator of Port Terminal Burgas East II and Port Terminal Burgas West – parts of the national public Port Burgas. Located in the region of Burgas Bay on the Black Sea Coast, BMF Port Burgas is the closest to the Bosphorus deep-water port. It offers excellent access (deep-water berths, all-year-round navigation, and no nautical restrictions) and can receive Panamax-type vessels. With its 19 berths and a total quay length of approx. 3.3km., BMF Port Burgas is one of the largest and deepest ports in the Black Sea region and there can be handled and stored various kinds of cargo. It is equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and extensive rail and road connections, as well as a highly qualified and experienced management team and staff. Different types of bulk, general, liquid, grain cargo and containers are handled on the territory of BMF Port Burgas. Thanks to its clear focus on innovation in cargo handling, BMF Port Burgas has significantly increased the cargo traffic through the port terminals both as volume and as diversity. BMF Port Burgas operates 24/7 all year round

Company description: Koninklijke Vereniging voor Luchtvaart De KNVvL is opgericht op 19 oktober 1907 als Vereeniging ter Bevordering van de Luchtscheepvaart. Al heel gauw werd de vereniging hernoemd in Nederlandse Vereniging voor Luchtvaart (NVvL). De eerste aanschaf was de ballon "Rotterdam" en het aantrekken van de gebrevetteerde ballonvaarder kapitein der genie P.J. Post van der Steur. Nadat men eerst in 1908 een Nederlandstalig aanhangsel meegaf bij het Belgische blad La Conquête de l'Air van de Belgische luchtvaartvereniging, ging men in 1909 over tot het uitgeven van een eigen blad Het Luchtschip wat enkele maanden later al weer werd herdoopt in De Luchtvaart. Eveneens sloot men zich in 1909 aan bij de Franse overkoepelende organisatie FAI. Vanaf 14 november 1912 mocht men het predicaat Koninklijk voeren. De Koninklijke Nederlandse Vereniging voor Luchtvaart, de KNVvL is de overkoepelende organisatie voor alle luchtsporten en luchtvaart hobby's in Nederland. De KNVvL is als sportbond aangesloten bij het NOC*NSF en de internationale federatie FAI. De KNVvL bestaat uit de volgende afdelingen: Aerobatics Algemene luchtvaart afdeling (ALA) Ballonvaren Gemotoriseerd vliegen Historische Luchtvaart Luchtvaartkennis Luchtvaartwetenschappen Modelvliegsport Parachutespringen Schermvliegen Zeilvliegen Zweefvliegen

Company description: Europrim Group este mai mult decât o casă de expediții. Din 2005 ne poziționăm printre cei mai importanți furnizori de servicii logistice si de transport din România, oferind clienților noștri servicii de calitate, rapide și eficiente, la prețuri competitive. Parteneriatele strategice cu elita transportatorilor naționali și internaționali susțin misiunea grupului de a asigura servicii logistice personalizate, oriunde pe glob. De la transport rutier, feroviar, maritim și aerian ori intermodal, până la comisionariat vamal și depozitare, aducem calitatea, siguranța și fiabilitatea la un nivel și mai înalt prin certificările și distincțiile obținute de-a lungul anilor de experiență în industrie: suntem membri certificați IATA, FIATA și TIACA, agent exclusiv United Shipping, Inc. pentru România și Bulgaria, membri Cargo Partner Network, Largo+ și GLA. Și totul datorită culturii organizaționale sănătoase, echipelor unite și procedurilor de lucru bine puse la punct. ----------------------------------------------------- Europrim Group is more than a freight forwarder. Since 2005 we have been one of the leading providers of logistics and transport services in Romania, offering our customers quality, fast and efficient services at competitive prices. Strategic partnerships with elite national and international carriers support the Group's mission to provide customized logistics services anywhere in the world. From road, rail, sea, air and intermodal transport, to customs brokerage and warehousing, we bring quality, safety and reliability to an even higher level through certifications and distinctions earned over the years of experience in the industry: we are IATA, FIATA and TIACA certified members, United Shipping, Inc. exclusive agent for Romania and Bulgaria, Cargo Partner Network, Largo+ and GLA members. And it's all thanks to our healthy organisational culture, close-knit teams and well-developed working procedures.

Company description: Effektiv logistik för en starkare industri i norra Sverige ShoreLink är en ledande aktör inom transport och logistik i norra Sverige med verksamhet i Skellefteå, Piteå, Luleå och Kalix. Vi ser till att gods rör sig sömlöst – till sjöss, på räls och väg – med tjänster som spänner över skeppsklarering, spedition, lastning, lossning samt maskin- och transportlösningar. Med rötterna i Piteå och nära samarbete med regionens tunga basindustri erbjuder vi skräddarsydda, hållbara lösningar för varje kund. Vår moderna fordonsflotta, engagerade team på cirka 250 medarbetare och en omsättning på 300 Mkr gör oss till en stabil och framåtblickande partner. Vi tror på smart logistik som förenklar vardagen, driver utveckling och stärker industrin – alltid med lokal närvaro, lång erfarenhet och stort engagemang.

Company description: DN Logistica è un’azienda di trasporto merci intermodale, trasporto merci su strada e logistica integrata, con base in Sicilia e attiva da decenni su tutto il territorio nazionale. DN Logistica, inoltre, è l’unica azienda siciliana a disporre di un moderno polo logistico ferroviario privato, a ridosso dello scalo merci di Catania-Bicocca e con grandi magazzini dedicati alla movimentazione delle merci in arrivo nel terminal: una grande novità per il mercato della logistica  in Sicilia, con notevoli vantaggi di tempi e di costo per i clienti. In un contesto di mercato profondamente mutato negli ultimi anni, DN Logistica si propone non più come semplice trasportatore, ma nella veste di azienda partner per i trasporti intermodali di merci e per l’esecuzione dei servizi di raccolta, stoccaggio e consegna su tutto il territorio italiano. DN Logistica opera nelle seguenti aree di attività: - trasporti di merci su strada e intermodali : una moderna flotta mezzi coordinata dal centro operativo, in grado di servire l’intera penisola ricorrendo all’utilizzo combinato di camion, treni e navi per garantire celerità e flessibilità nella distribuzione delle merci; - depositi industriali e servizi logistici : magazzini per lo stoccaggio e la conservazione sicura dei prodotti e la piccola distribuzione ai clienti finali; - piattaforma logistica di 30.000 mq alla zona industriale di Catania con polo ferroviario privato, in una posizione strategica per la distribuzione in tutta la Sicilia. Eroghiamo questi servizi valorizzando i nostri punti di forza: - professionalità di tutto il nostro personale amministrativo ed operativo; - efficienza nei tempi e nelle modalità di trasporto delle merci; - sicurezza a garanzia della merce dei nostri clienti.
